cultures.description: Cormyreans have a stubborness and refusal to admit defeat that even the most determined invaders find spiritually taxing.
Xenophobic and mysterious, with advanced knowledge of the arcane.
Hailing from the Scarlands, this is the main cultural heart of Sembia.

The Culture created when King Azoun I took thousands of Sembian serfs, who settled in the east. Later, when Selguant was won as a peace price, more Sembian blood came into the Cormyrean sphere. Since, they have intermarried and blended over many generations with the Cormyrean culture, while still retaining some of their old traditions.

languages.name: Common (Cormyrean)
languages.description: The same language the western areas speak, as does sembia - however, all have specific dialects, that are important for nuanced conversation. Cormyrean Common is like an amalgamation of different languages from slaves that lived in cormyr under the House of the Dragon some thousand years ago.
